description: Unique identifier for the recorded change of a work order’s status.
Date and time the status change event was recorded.
Identifier of the user or role who performed the status change.
Business identifier of the work order whose status changed.
Snapshot of the work order identifier captured at change time for reporting; likely denormalized—confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the work order’s description at the time of the status change; confirm with SME.
Resulting status code after the change.
Snapshot identifier for the resulting status at change time; likely mirrors lookup ID—confirm with SME.
Text label of the resulting status captured at the time of change.
Code for the prior status before the change.
Snapshot identifier for the prior status at change time; likely mirrors lookup ID—confirm with SME.
Text label of the prior status captured at the time of change.
Identifier of the asset/equipment associated with the work order.
Reference to the maintenance procedure or job plan associated with the change or work order; likely a procedure ID—confirm with SME.
Timestamp when this log record was last updated in the system.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record; may duplicate the general last-update timestamp depending on process—confirm with SME.
Indicator for header versus detail row within a grouped status-change event; likely 1=header, 0=detail—confirm with SME.
User who created this status change record.
Timestamp when this status change record was created.
User who last modified this status change record.
Timestamp when this status change record was last modified by a user.
